description: Show your loved ones how much you care by gifting them a batch of these fudgy gingerbread cookies this Christmas. These treats will be sure to delight.
keywords: Biscuit & cookie,Dec 2021,Seafood free,Christmas,Gingerbread,Cookie,Tree nut free,Baking,Peanut free
name: Gingerbread Crinkle Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place butter and molasses in a small saucepan. Heat over low heat, stirring, for 2 minutes or until melted. Transfer to a large bowl and set aside for 15 minutes to cool. Add egg and stir until combined. Add flours, brown sugar, ginger, cinnamon, mixed spice and bicarbonate of soda to butter mixture, then stir to combine.
Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper.

Place icing sugar in a small bowl. Roll level tablespoonfuls dough into balls to make a total of 25 balls. Roll balls, one at a time, in icing sugar until completely coated. Place balls, 5cm apart, on trays.
Bake for 15 minutes or until just firm to touch. Stand on trays for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool.
